draftSaveMessage: Your record has been saved as a draft
closeWithoutSaving: Your record has been closed without saving.
publishRequestedSCBD: Record saved. A publishing request has been sent to your SCBD.
publishRequestedABS: Record saved. A publishing request has been sent to your Publishing Authority.
publishRequestedBCH: Record saved. A publishing request has been sent to your BCH-NFP.
recordPublished: Record published. The record will be now publicly accessible on the Clearing-House.
